title: Sir Grodus

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Scout** (3x, day): Check a player, if 2 or more players voted them, learn the roles of all their voters, but not who they belong to individually.
- **Clock Beam**: Pick a target, their ability processes on the following night, become astral and you learn what it does.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you target teammates with **Clock Beam**, it affets all actions targeting them instead.
- You can't delay delayed actions.

desc:
Post 5185
*"I am the supreme leader of the secret society of X-Nauts! I am Grodus!"*
